price: Müjdeleyiciler ve uyarıcılar olarak rasûller gönderdik ki, rasûllerden sonra insanların Allah’a karşı bir bahaneleri olmasın. Allah Aziz'dir, Hakim'dir.
arabic: رُّسُلٗا مُّبَشِّرِينَ وَمُنذِرِينَ لِئَلَّا يَكُونَ لِلنَّاسِ عَلَى ٱللَّهِ حُجَّةُۢ بَعۡدَ ٱلرُّسُلِۚ وَكَانَ ٱللَّهُ عَزِيزًا حَكِيمٗا

version.title: Turkish translation - Shaaban Britsh
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Turkish by Shaaban Britsh. Notice: Some referred translated verses corrected by Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: rusulan mubashirīna wamundhirīna li-allā yakūna lilnnāsi ʿalā al-lahi ḥujjatun baʿda al-rusuli wakāna al-lahu ʿazīzan ḥakīman
